ingredients: unchecked1 1/2 pounds ground beef, ground pork, bulk pork sausage, uncooked ground turkey or uncooked bulk turkey sausage
unchecked2 14-ounce cans reduced-sodium beef broth or chicken broth

unchecked1 15-ounce can golden hominy, rinsed and drained
unchecked2 cups loose-pack frozen diced hash brown potatoes with onions and peppers

uncheckedDairy sour cream, chopped avocado and/or shredded cheddar cheese (optional)
